content: In preparation for moving FHIR from svn to github, all the collateral material in svn has been moved to https://github.com/FHIR/documents. I will delete it from svn as soon as I figure out how to do that
let me know if you want to be a committer to the documents repository
@Grahame Grieve Please add me as a committer - my github account is 'rettema'. Will this now be the permanent home for this material?
Where can I find info on the timing of this change, etc?
Me too please, I'm sitting on the IHE FHIR wg so if we produce things, it might be helpful
the non-build material is moved already. There's no processes around that material so moving it was trivial.

moving the build process is not so simple. I'd like to have it moved by San Diego meeting, but first we have to write a change plan, and then examine the list of tooling changes need around the process, and then figure out how we change over
unlike the supporting material, we won't move the build without forward planning and announcements
